description:
The girl "Roze" from the empire couldn`t understand. Why the girl "Raye," who should be her enemy, was coming to save her instead of destroying her. Each time Roze clashed with Raye and the "Sky Striker," she felt something warm and indescribable from Raye. The empire saw through Roze`s hesitation, and she was absorbed into the tactical weapon "Zeke."
As Roze becomes part of Zeke and loses consciousness, what will she feel in Raye, who is coming straight towards her---
Source: Official website

titles.title: Sky Striker Ace II: "Sky Striker Ace - Roze"
閃刀姫II「 閃刀姫－ロゼ」
